critique: The document is an executive order issued by President Obama in 2014, expanding sanctions against the Russian Federation due to its actions in Ukraine. It blocks property and interests of individuals and entities operating in specific sectors of the Russian economy or supporting those sanctioned. It also suspends the entry of individuals meeting certain criteria into the United States. The order cites the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) and the National Emergencies Act (NEA) as its legal basis.
